abstract: Video game makers are addicted to sequels.
snippet: Video game makers are addicted to sequels.
lead_paragraph: There may not be an entertainment category that is so predictable as video games. The latest video game sales figures came out Thursday from NPD, which measures sales of consumer products. And the list of best-selling games looks very familiar, going back many, many years.

headline.main: Return of the Video Game Sequel: Part 12
